source_item.foreign_topic: Abolishing Mandatory Closing Days for Supermarkets
source_item.foreign_context: Regulations requiring large supermarkets to close on certain days aim to protect small, traditional markets. source_item.foreign_topic: Lowering the Age of Criminal Responsibility
source_item.foreign_context: There is a public debate about whether to lower the minimum age of criminal responsibility in response to serious crimes committed by minors. source_item.foreign_context: Laws to ban tutoring that teaches school curriculum ahead of schedule aim to reduce the academic 'rat race' and normalize public education.
